item.title: Book Notes｜Show Your Work
item.description: 1. YOU DON’T HAVE TO BE A GENIUS # Find a scenius: Great ideas are birthed by a group of creative individuals.

item.title: Book Notes｜Steal Like An Artist
item.description: 1. STEAL LIKE AN ARTIST # Stop trying to make something out of nothing, embrace influence of what came before instead of running away from it.
